column4: i installed the nvidia-glx-new and played around with screend and graphics then GDM won't boot so reinstalled nvidia-glx GDM won't start if restricted driver is enabled... what could possibly wrong ?
i installed the nvidia-glx-new and played around with screen and graphics then GDM won't boot so reinstalled nvidia-glx GDM won't start if restricted driver is enabled... what could possibly wrong ?
Have you tried running Envy to install your 3D drivers?  It worked for me on a system that didn't work by enabling the restricted driver.
